imdb.title: Dance with Devils
imdb.plot: Ritsuka Tachibana has always been a good student, so she is completely shocked when she is suddenly summoned by the student council. When her mother gets kidnapped, her life is turned upside down, and Ritsuka gets drawn into a wor...

episodes.title: Depravity and the Forbidden Quadrille
episodes.plot: Shiko Academy student Ritsuka Tachibana is summoned by the mysterious and handsome boys of the Student Council and accused of violating school rules. On top of which, a horrible incident happens at home. Who can she turn to, and why is she being targeted?

episodes.title: Jitterbug of Doubts and Secrets
episodes.plot: Ritsuka meets the rest of the student council before leaving with Rem, its president, to pursue a promising lead in the search for her mother.

episodes.title: Tango of Passion and Seduction
episodes.plot: Ritsuka's brother Lindo goes to unusual lengths to keep her safe. Meanwhile, dashing student council member Urie has a few words to say about Lindo...

episodes.title: Bolero of Solitude and Melancholy
episodes.plot: Ritsuka learns some truths about her family--and about the student council--before having a confrontation with someone who isn't who he seems to be.

episodes.title: B-Boying of Vainglory and Impulse
episodes.plot: Lindo joins Ritsuka at the academy to keep her safe, but Mage decides Ritsuka needs to spend some quality time with him and his irresistible charms.

episodes.title: Farandole of Reminiscence and Labyrinths
episodes.plot: After Shiki opens up to Ritsuka in the school garden, he takes her to a mysterious museum full of what he claims are Ritsuka's memories. But are they?

episodes.title: Pas de Deux of Fantasy and Innocence
episodes.plot: While Rem's father scolds him for dragging his feet on the grimoire, Ritsuka learns more about its shocking secrets from a new and unexpected source.

episodes.title: Waltz of Transience
episodes.plot: Ritsuka's been through a lot of surprising events lately, but the school's formal dance may top them all--and what follows may change things forever.

episodes.title: War Cry of Secrets and Contrariness
episodes.plot: The Exorcist Society reveals its true intentions--and the truth about Lindo; Lindo divulges another secret that upends his relationship with Ritsuka.

episodes.title: Tarantella of Desire and Deceit
episodes.plot: The revelations just keep on coming as Ritsuka learns more about who she is and where she came from. Rem is confronted over his feelings for Ritsuka.

episodes.title: Samba of Jet and Crimson
episodes.plot: Ritsuka has an audience with the vampire king, who claims to be able to solve her grimoire problem. Will she get her life back, or lose it for good?

episodes.title: Opera Ball of Endings and Beginnings
episodes.plot: It's the final showdown as Rem and Lindo fight to keep Ritsuka safe and the grimoire out of Nesta's hands. Ritsuka must make one last, big decision.
